alert.note: Alert for Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 3:56PM EDT until July 27 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Warren County in central North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Norlina, or near Warrenton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warrenton, Norlina, Littleton, Macon, Wise, Lake Gaston and Southpointe And Morningstar Marinas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
